an4.97:1.3: Attahitāya paṭipanno no parahitāya, parahitāya paṭipanno no attahitāya, nevattahitāya paṭipanno no parahitāya, attahitāya ceva paṭipanno parahitāya ca.
an4.97:2.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo attahitāya paṭipanno hoti, no parahitāya?
an4.97:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo khippanisantī ca hoti kusalesu dhammesu, sutānañca dhammānaṃ dhārakajātiko hoti, dhātānañca dhammānaṃ atthūpaparikkhī hoti atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya, dhammānudhammappaṭipanno hoti;
an4.97:2.3: no ca kalyāṇavāco hoti kalyāṇavākkaraṇo poriyā vācāya samannāgato vissaṭṭhāya anelagalāya atthassa viññāpaniyā, no ca sandassako hoti samādapako samuttejako sampahaṃsako sabrahmacārīnaṃ.
an4.97:2.4: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo attahitāya paṭipanno hoti, no parahitāya.
an4.97:3.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo parahitāya paṭipanno hoti, no attahitāya?
an4.97:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo na heva kho khippanisantī hoti kusalesu dhammesu, no ca sutānaṃ dhammānaṃ dhārakajātiko hoti, no ca dhātānaṃ dhammānaṃ atthūpaparikkhī hoti, no ca atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammappaṭipanno hoti;
an4.97:3.3: kalyāṇavāco ca hoti kalyāṇavākkaraṇo poriyā vācāya samannāgato vissaṭṭhāya anelagalāya atthassa viññāpaniyā, sandassako ca hoti samādapako samuttejako sampahaṃsako sabrahmacārīnaṃ.
an4.97:3.4: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo parahitāya paṭipanno hoti, no attahitāya.
an4.97:4.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo nevattahitāya paṭipanno hoti, no parahitāya?
an4.97:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo na heva kho khippanisantī hoti kusalesu dhammesu, no ca sutānaṃ dhammānaṃ dhārakajātiko hoti, no ca dhātānaṃ dhammānaṃ atthūpaparikkhī hoti, no ca atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammappaṭipanno hoti;
an4.97:4.3: no ca kalyāṇavāco hoti kalyāṇavākkaraṇo poriyā vācāya samannāgato vissaṭṭhāya anelagalāya atthassa viññāpaniyā, no ca sandassako hoti samādapako samuttejako sampahaṃsako sabrahmacārīnaṃ.
an4.97:4.4: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo nevattahitāya paṭipanno hoti, no parahitāya.
an4.97:5.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo attahitāya ceva paṭipanno hoti parahitāya ca?
an4.97:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo khippanisantī ca hoti kusalesu dhammesu, sutānañca dhammānaṃ dhārakajātiko hoti, dhātānañca dhammānaṃ atthūpaparikkhī hoti atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya, dhammānudhammappaṭipanno hoti;
an4.97:5.3: kalyāṇavāco ca hoti kalyāṇavākkaraṇo poriyā vācāya samannāgato vissaṭṭhāya anelagalāya atthassa viññāpaniyā, sandassako ca hoti samādapako samuttejako sampahaṃsako sabrahmacārīnaṃ.
an4.97:5.4: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo attahitāya ceva paṭipanno hoti parahitāya ca.
an4.97:5.5: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
